titles.title: Recognizing the achievements and contributions of the Waterfowl Population Survey Program of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.
Recognizing the achievements and contributions of the Waterfowl Population Survey Program of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.

bill.summary: Recognizes the achievements and contributions of, and expresses support for, the Waterfowl Population Survey Program of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service. Encourages the Service to increase partnerships to continue growth and development of the Program.
